taxi.title: Airport taxi
taxi.description: We can arrange a taxi for 700 THB (cash). The driver will wait for you at arrivals with your name on a sign. Just send us your flight details.

doorCode.title: Door code
doorCode.note: We'll send it to you a few days before

atm.title: Important: ATMs in Thailand
atm.description: ATMs here give you the cash BEFORE returning your card. So many people forget their card and leave. Don't be that person. Also, always choose 'Without conversion' to avoid terrible exchange rates.

esim.title: Get an eSIM before you fly
esim.description: Install it before takeoff so you have internet the second you land. Trust us, it's a game changer.

immigration.title: Immigration queue
immigration.description: Can be 30 min or 2 hours depending on when you arrive. Bring a book, download a podcast, be zen.

fastTrack.title: Fast Track / Priority Lane
fastTrack.description: There's a meet-and-greet service that escorts you through the priority lane. Around 1000â€“2000 THB per person. Worth it if you're arriving late or traveling with kids.

tm0.title: Fill out the TM0 form
tm0.description: You need to complete this before arrival. Do it on the plane.

spas.title: Massages & spas
spas.bookingNote: We can book for you if you want.

boats.title: Boat trips
boats.departure: Most boats leave from Rawai Beach.
boats.help: We know good captains. Just ask.

dayPasses.title: Hotel day passes
dayPasses.description: Fancy a day at a 5-star pool? Day passes get you access to hotel facilities, sometimes with food/drink credit.

tops.title: Tops app
tops.description: Grocery delivery straight to the house.

transport.title: Grab / Bolt
transport.description: Like Uber. Use these for rides.

pharmacy.title: Pharmacies
pharmacy.description: Tons of them around town, well stocked.

water.title: Water & sun
water.description: Drink bottled water. Wear sunscreen. You'll thank us.

atHome.title: House rules (simple)
atHome.ac: Turn off AC when you leave rooms. Close doors when AC is on.

guestForm.title: Help us prep your stay
guestForm.description: Tell us what you like so we can stock up.
guestForm.confirmation: We received everything. See you soon.
